name: Toxic-MD
description: A savage WhatsApp bot by xh_clinton to clown noobs and rule chats! 💥

PREFIX.description: Set the command prefix (. or !). No nulls, or Toxic-MD will mock you! 😏

BOT_NAME.description: Bot name’s Toxic-MD. Change it and face the wrath! 😈

OWNER_NAME.description: The legend xh_clinton owns this bot. Bow down! 😎

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Owner numbers, comma-separated. Get it right or get wrecked! 😡

STICKER_NAME.description: Sticker pack name. Toxic-MD stickers hit different! 💀

MODE.description: Bot mode: public, private, inbox, or groups. Choose or cry! 😜

ALWAYS_ONLINE.description: True to keep Toxic-MD online 24/7, ready to roast! 🔥

AUTO_STATUS_SEEN.description: True to auto-stalk statuses like a pro! 👀

AUTO_STATUS_REACT.description: True to slap toxic emojis on statuses! 😈

AUTO_STATUS_REPLY.description: True to auto-reply and clown statuses! 😜

AUTO_STATUS_MSG.description: Savage status reply message. Make it hurt! 💥

ANTI_LINK.description: True to nuke group links. No spammers survive! 🚫

ANTI_BAD.description: True to delete bad words. Keep it clean or get smoked! 😡

MENTION_REPLY.description: True for voice replies when mentioned. Annoy the squad! 🗣️

MENU_IMAGE_URL.description: Menu/mention image URL. Make it fire or get roasted! 🎨

DESCRIPTION.description: Caption for menus. Powered by xh_clinton, respect! 😎

DELETE_LINKS.description: True to delete links without kicking. Be sneaky! 😏

AUTO_RECORDING.description: True for auto recording. Be that annoying bot! 🎙️

AUTO_TYPING.description: True to show typing. Tease those noobs! ⌨️

AUTO_REACT.description: True to react to every message. Emoji spam time! 😈

CUSTOM_REACT.description: True for custom reactions. Go full toxic! 😎

CUSTOM_REACT_EMOJIS.description: Custom emojis for reactions. Be savage! 😈,💀,🔥,🖕

ANTI_DEL_PATH.description: Set to 'same' to resend deleted messages in same chat. Sneaky! 🕵️

READ_MESSAGE.description: True to auto-read all messages. Stalk mode on! 👀
